item.title: Billie Lourd Says She 'Will Never Stop Missing' Mom Carrie Fisher as She Marks 9 Years Since Her Death
item.description: Fisher died on Dec. 27, 2016, at the age of 60 after going into cardiac arrest on a flight

item.title: Gwyneth Paltrow Refused a Sex Scene with Ethan Hawke in “Great Expectations” Because She Thought Her Dad Would Have a Heart Attack
item.description: "It really bothered me. Now, I wouldn't care," Paltrow said

item.title: Tori Spelling Cancels Las Vegas Event with Brian Austin Green for Health Reasons: ‘This Hurts to Share’
item.description: “Right now, I have to listen to my body and choose my health,” Spelling wrote while canceling the ’90s After Dark Party
